welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Glenfield, the charming town known for its picturesque landscapes and rich history. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at East Midlands Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: Dedicated terminal for handling cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, no password required.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cottesmore RAF Airport handles both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Cottesmore RAF Airport is responsible for handling all cargo and freight shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Nottingham Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Nottingham Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at West Midlands International Airport handles all commercial flights and is equipped with modern amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at West Midlands International Airport is responsible for handling all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Birmingham Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Birmingham Airport is dedicated to low-cost carriers and charter flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Birmingham Airport serves primarily international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
